seo.title: Menu | Nepalese Curries & Pub Classics | {{brand.fullName}}
seo.description: Browse our Cambridge menu of Nepali chef specials—Himali lamb, Khasi ko masu, sizzling platters—served alongside Sunday roasts, burgers, and cask ales. Call +44 1223 921122 for bookings or takeaway.
seo.keywords: {{brand.fullNameNoArticle}} menu, Nepalese curry Cambridge, Himali lamb, Khasi ko masu, momo Cambridge, Nepali mixed grill, Sunday roast Cambridge, heated cabins, Sky Sports pub food

openGraph.title: Menu | Nepalese Food & Pub Classics | {{brand.fullName}}
openGraph.description: Discover our interactive menu with filters covering Nepalese curries, pub favourites, vegan dishes, and heated cabin feasts opposite Cambridge Retail Park.

hero.title: Our Menu: Authentic Nepalese Cuisine & British Pub Classics
hero.subtitle: Discover authentic Himalayan flavours prepared with traditional recipes alongside your favourite pub classics. From Bhutuwa chicken and Pokhareli fish curry to British favourites and well-kept cask ales.

sections.description: Experience authentic Nepalese cuisine prepared by talented chefs Ravi Acharya and Purna Man Bajrachaya, alongside traditional British pub favourites.
sections.allergenNotice: Please inform us of any allergies or dietary requirements when ordering.
